title: Overview of Child Care in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What are the three main types of child care available in Timor-Leste?
Which type of child care is most common in Timor-Leste?
Where are center-based care facilities more commonly found in Timor-Leste?
What age group is typically served by center-based care in Timor-Leste?
Which type of care is more prevalent in rural areas of Timor-Leste?
What is a major challenge for accessing child care in rural areas of Timor-Leste?
How does the cost of child care typically compare between urban and rural areas in Timor-Leste?
choices: Urban care is generally more expensive
Rural care is generally more expensive
Costs are typically the same in both areas
There is no cost for child care in Timor-Leste
questions.answer: Urban care is generally more expensive

questions.question: What is a common form of payment for child care in rural Timor-Leste?
Which of the following best describes traditional attitudes towards child care in Timorese society?
choices: Preference for formal education from an early age
Belief that extended family should be responsible for child care
Encouragement of women to prioritize careers over child-rearing
Reliance on government-provided child care services
questions.answer: Belief that extended family should be responsible for child care

questions.question: In urban areas of Timor-Leste, what change is occurring in attitudes towards child care?
choices: Increasing rejection of formal child care
Growing acceptance of formal child care options
Preference for sending children to rural areas for care
questions.answer: Growing acceptance of formal child care options

questions.question: What is a key factor driving the demand for quality care options in urban areas of Timor-Leste?
Which type of child care in Timor-Leste is most likely to be regulated by government standards?
What is a characteristic of home-based care in Timor-Leste?
choices: Typically serves large groups of children

questions.question: Which area in Timor-Leste typically has more licensed child care providers?
What is a common challenge for child care providers in rural Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is a concern raised by the disparity in child care access between rural and urban areas in Timor-Leste?
choices: Unequal access to early education opportunities
Lack of cultural diversity in urban centers
questions.answer: Unequal access to early education opportunities

questions.question: What initiative has the Timorese government considered to expand access to quality care in rural areas?
choices: Outsourcing child care to neighboring countries

questions.question: What is a characteristic of informal care arrangements in Timor-Leste?
choices: Often provided by relatives or neighbors
questions.answer: Often provided by relatives or neighbors

questions.question: Which of the following is a challenge faced by families seeking child care in urban areas of Timor-Leste?
choices: Shortage of children to fill centers

questions.question: What role do grandparents often play in child care in Timorese society?
Which factor is contributing to changing perspectives on child care in urban areas of Timor-Leste?
choices: Increasing recognition of early education benefits
questions.answer: Increasing recognition of early education benefits

questions.question: What is a common characteristic of center-based care in Timor-Leste?
Which type of child care in Timor-Leste is most likely to be flexible in terms of hours and arrangements?
What is a significant barrier to expanding formal child care options in rural Timor-Leste?
In Timor-Leste, which group is traditionally expected to be the primary caregivers for young children?
What is a potential benefit of center-based care recognized by some urban families in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is a challenge in improving the quality of child care across Timor-Leste?
choices: Excess of trained early childhood educators
Overabundance of resources in rural areas
Shortage of trained early childhood educators
questions.answer: Shortage of trained early childhood educators

questions.question: What type of payment is often accepted for home-based care in rural areas of Timor-Leste?
Which of the following best describes the current state of child care subsidies in Timor-Leste?
choices: More readily available in urban areas
Not available anywhere in the country
questions.answer: More readily available in urban areas

questions.question: What is a key difference between center-based and home-based care in Timor-Leste?
choices: Home-based care is only for infants
Center-based care typically serves larger groups
questions.answer: Center-based care typically serves larger groups
